entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Flurries beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
